verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Moreover he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what תִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> that thou findest אֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> eat אֱכוֹל֙ <WH398> eat אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <WH4039> this roll הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> and go דַּבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וָאֶפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> So I opened אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֑י <WH6310> my mouth וַיַּ֣אֲכִלֵ֔נִי <WH398> and he caused me to eat אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַמְּגִלָּ֥ה <WH4039> that roll הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> He

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man בִּטְנְךָ֤ <WH990> cause thy belly תַֽאֲכֵל֙ <WH398> to eat וּמֵעֶ֣יךָ <WH4578> thy bowels תְמַלֵּ֔א <WH4390> and fill אֵ֚ת <WH854> for הַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <WH4039> with this roll הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> that I give אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about וָאֹ֣כְלָ֔ה <WH398> thee Then did I eat וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> [it] and it was in my mouth כִּדְבַ֥שׁ <WH1706> as honey לְמָתֽוֹק׃ <WH4966> for sweetness פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man לֶךְ־ <WH1980> along בֹּא֙ <WH935> get אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> thee unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <WH1696> and speak בִדְבָרַ֖י <WH1697> with my words אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for לֹא֩ <WH3808> not אֶל־ <WH413> to עַ֨ם <WH5971> to a people עִמְקֵ֥י <WH6012> of a strange שָׂפָ֛ה <WH8193> speech וְכִבְדֵ֥י <WH3515> and of an hard לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> language אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שָׁל֑וּחַ <WH7971> For thou [art] not sent אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> [but] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> nor אֶל־ <WH413> about עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> Not to many עִמְקֵ֤י <WH6012> of a strange שָׂפָה֙ <WH8193> speech וְכִבְדֵ֣י <WH3515> and of an hard לָשׁ֔וֹן <WH3956> language אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot תִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> thou canst not understand דִּבְרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1697> whose words אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> cannot אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about שְׁלַחְתִּ֔יךָ <WH7971> Surely had I sent הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like יִשְׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> thee to them they would have hearkened אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> But the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֹאבוּ֙ <WH14> will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since אֵינָ֥ם <WH369> are not אֹבִ֖ים <WH14> unto thee for they will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me כִּ֚י <WH3588> Surely כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto me for all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel חִזְקֵי־ <WH2389> harder מֵ֥צַח <WH4696> brow וּקְשֵׁי־ <WH7186> churlish לֵ֖ב <WH3820> care for הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> Behold I have made אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֛יךָ <WH6440> thy face חֲזָקִ֖ים <WH2389> strong לְעֻמַּ֣ת <WH5980> against פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> their faces וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> מִצְחֲךָ֥ <WH4696> and thy forehead חָזָ֖ק <WH2389> strong לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> against מִצְחָֽם׃ <WH4696> their foreheads

כְּשָׁמִ֛יר <WH8068> As an adamant חָזָ֥ק <WH2389> harder מִצֹּ֖ר <WH6864> than flint נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> have I made מִצְחֶ֑ךָ <WH4696> thy forehead לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Do תִירָ֤א <WH3372> fear אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵחַ֣ת <WH2865> them not neither be dismayed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> at their looks כִּ֛י <WH3588> though בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Moreover he said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּבָרַי֙ <WH1697> all my words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֲדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> that I shall speak אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about קַ֥ח <WH3947> unto thee receive בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> in thine heart וּבְאָזְנֶ֥יךָ <WH241> with thine ears שְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> and hear

וְלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> Go בֹּ֤א <WH935> get אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגּוֹלָה֙ <WH1473> thee to them of the captivity אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children עַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> of thy people וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <WH1696> and speak אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> to וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> unto them and tell אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD אִֽם־ <WH518> whether יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> whether they will hear וְאִם־ <WH518> or יֶחְדָּֽלוּ׃ <WH2308> or whether they will forbear

וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <WH5375> took me up ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> Then the spirit וָאֶשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and I heard אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> behind ק֖וֹל <WH6963> me a voice רַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> rushing גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> of a great בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> [saying] Blessed כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> [be] the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> from his place

וְק֣וֹל ׀ <WH6963> [I heard] also the noise כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> of the wings הַחַיּ֗וֹת <WH2416> of the living creatures מַשִּׁיקוֹת֙ <WH5401> that touched אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <WH269> another וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the noise הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> of the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <WH5980> over against וְק֖וֹל <WH6963> them and a noise רַ֥עַשׁ <WH7494> rushing גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> of a great

וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> So the spirit נְשָׂאַ֖תְנִי <WH5375> lifted me up וַתִּקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> and took me away וָאֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> went מַר֙ <WH4751> in bitterness בַּחֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> in the heat רוּחִ֔י <WH7307> of my spirit וְיַד־ <WH3027> but the hand יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD עָלַ֖י <WH5921> and חָזָֽקָה׃ <WH2388> was strong

וָאָב֨וֹא <WH935> Then I came אֶל־ <WH413> beside הַגּוֹלָ֜ה <WH1473> to them of the captivity תֵּ֣ל אָ֠בִיב <WH8512> at Telabib הַיֹּשְׁבִ֤ים <WH3427> that dwelt אֶֽל־ <WH413> beside נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָר֙ <WH3529> of Chebar [וָאֲשֶׁר כ] (וָֽאֵשֵׁ֔ב <WH834> after ק) הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> and I יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> and I sat שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וָאֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> where they sat שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> where שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> them seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days מַשְׁמִ֥ים <WH8074> there astonished בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> And it came to pass at the end שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> of seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days פ וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man צֹפֶ֥ה <WH6822> thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> I have made לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <WH8085> therefore hear מִפִּי֙ <WH6310> at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <WH2094> and give them warning אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <WH559> When I say לָֽרָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <WH4191> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <WH4191> die וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> out הִזְהַרְתּ֗וֹ <WH2094> and thou givest him not warning וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or דִבַּ֛רְתָּ <WH1696> nor speakest לְהַזְהִ֥יר <WH2094> to warn רָשָׁ֛ע <WH7563> the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <WH1870> way הָרְשָׁעָ֖ה <WH7563> from his wicked לְחַיֹּת֑וֹ <WH2421> to save his life ה֤וּא <WH1931> that רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> the same wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> will I require

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> Yet כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if הִזְהַ֣רְתָּ <WH2094> Yet if thou warn רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> the wicked וְלֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁב֙ <WH7725> and he turn מֵֽרִשְׁע֔וֹ <WH7562> not from his wickedness וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> way הָרְשָׁעָ֑ה <WH7563> nor from his wicked ה֚וּא <WH1931> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <WH5337> but thou hast delivered ס

וּבְשׁ֨וּב <WH7725> [man] doth turn צַדִּ֤יק <WH6662> When a righteous מִצִּדְקוֹ֙ <WH6664> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and commit עָ֔וֶל <WH5766> iniquity וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and I lay מִכְשׁ֛וֹל <WH4383> a stumblingblock לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> before ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יָמ֑וּת <WH4191> him he shall die כִּ֣י <WH3588> since לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not הִזְהַרְתּוֹ֙ <WH2094> because thou hast not given him warning בְּחַטָּאת֣וֹ <WH2403> in his sin יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> he shall die וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִזָּכַ֗רְןָ <WH2142> shall not be remembered צִדְקֹתָו֙ <WH6666> and his righteousness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he hath done וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> will I require

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> However כִּ֧י <WH3588> if הִזְהַרְתּ֣וֹ <WH2094> Nevertheless if thou warn צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> the righteous לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> should not חֲטֹ֛א <WH2398> sin צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> [man] that the righteous וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> does not חָטָ֑א <WH2398> not and he doth not sin חָי֤וֹ <WH2421> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶה֙ <WH2421> live כִּ֣י <WH3588> because נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> because he is warned וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <WH5337> also thou hast delivered ס

וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become עָלַ֛י <WH5921> was on שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יַד־ <WH3027> And the hand יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> was there upon me and he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me ק֥וּם <WH6965> unto me Arise צֵא֙ <WH3318> go forth אֶל־ <WH413> to הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <WH1237> into the plain וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and I will there talk אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

וָאָקוּם֮ <WH6965> Then I arose וָאֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> and went forth אֶל־ <WH413> to הַבִּקְעָה֒ <WH1237> into the plain וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> and behold the glory יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עֹמֵ֔ד <WH5975> stood כַּכָּב֕וֹד <WH3519> there as the glory אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> which I saw עַל־ <WH5921> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> of Chebar וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and I fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> on my face

וַתָּבֹא־ <WH935> entered בִ֣י ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> Then the spirit וַתַּעֲמִדֵ֖נִי <WH5975> into me and set עַל־ <WH5921> on רַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> me upon my feet וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> and spake אֹתִי֙ <WH854> for וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> with me and said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֹּ֥א <WH935> unto me Go הִסָּגֵ֖ר <WH5462> shut בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> thyself within בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> thine house

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> But thou O son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold נָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> behold they shall put עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> and עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <WH5688> bands וַֽאֲסָר֖וּךָ <WH631> upon thee and shall bind בָּהֶ֑ם וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> you cannot תֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> thee with them and thou shalt not go out בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

וּלְשֽׁוֹנְךָ֙ <WH3956> And I will make thy tongue אַדְבִּ֣יק <WH1692> cleave אֶל־ <WH413> to חִכֶּ֔ךָ <WH2441> to the roof of thy mouth וְנֶֽאֱלַ֔מְתָּ <WH481> that thou shalt be dumb וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and cannot תִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man מוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> rebukes כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> for they [are] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like
